p: Climate data (minimum temperature and humidity 2005–2013) per day for Tegucigalpa (city) was obtained from the National Centers for Environmental Information of the National Oceanic Atmospheric Administration (NCDC NOAA) (free to be accessed at https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov). The weather station ID was 78720099999, located at the Toncontin International Airport. The data used are made available on Figshare https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.c.4485503 (Louren¸co, 2019).
